Name: Venetian
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Burnished copper red and bittersweet with wine and a dash of elderflower, fruit liqueur and bitters.
History: Created in 2009 by Rich Hunt at Quo Vadis in London, England. It is based on the flavours of the spritz, but there are no bubbles of any kind.
